That's when she looks over and sees a pile of clothes on the floor, your clothes! Oh so nude hide and seek is the game huh? You better hide good because I'm gonna find you! She then gets up and takes all her clothes off! Your little body starts to shake as you get the hardest erection you've ever had. Ready or not! Here I come! You now want her to notice you more than ever. If she found you, oh the things she could do, the places she could put you! Ok I need to stay calm and focused. What should I do?
153.title: sits down at the couch to wait for you

info.brief_description: You're suddenly shrunk in your girlfriends house...Oh No!
info.description:
Your name is Ryan you are 18 have brown hair, brown eyes, and are 5'8". You are over your girlfriend Alexandra's(Alex) house when you suddenly shrink. She is 18, White with a nice tan(Greek), 5'7", has a nice shape, D cup bra, brown hair, blue-green eyes and a nice ass. She also has a mom who is 32 named Patrisha(Trish) and a friend Jessica. Trish is 5'6" Brown Hair DD size bra and a big ass and likes to jog, she's not hard on the eyes. Jessica is a tall 6 foot girl who has shoulder-length black hair green eyes and slightly slender. Here are a list of content allowed and not allowed.

Boobs=Yes
Bra=Yes
Ass=Yes
Panties=Yes
Eating=Yes
Feet=Yes
Interaction=You can if you want
Giant Guys=No
One sentence chapters=No
Ryan Dies=No
Adding other (girl)characters=OK(would like to keep it to mentioned characters mostly though)
Everything else is up to your imagination. Good luck writing. And please don't just look, you'll make this story better by adding to it.
